trans-unit.source: Represents the SharePoint logging service, which enables SharePoint project extensions to log messages into the **Output** window and **Error List**, depending on the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SharePoint 日志记录服务，根据指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />，可以使 SharePoint 项目扩展将消息记录到“输出”窗口和“错误列表”。

trans-unit.source: All logged messages go to a "SharePoint Tools" Output window pane, except when performing deployment, when messages are re-directed to the VS "Build" pane in the Output window.
trans-unit.target: 所有记录的消息时，转到"SharePoint 工具"输出窗格中，除执行部署，当消息会被重定向到输出窗口中的 VS"生成"窗格。

trans-unit.source: Opens the **Output** window and activates the current **Output** window pane.
trans-unit.target: 打开“输出”窗口，并激活当前的“输出”窗口窗格。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if successful; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，则返回 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Clears the **Error List** of all SharePoint Tool-related error messages.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有与 SharePoint 工具相关的错误消息的“错误列表”。

trans-unit.source: Error messages related to other Visual Studio activities (such as building) will remain in the **Error List**.
trans-unit.target: 与其他 Visual Studio 活动项目 （如建筑物） 相关的错误消息将保留在**错误列表**。

trans-unit.source: Returns a subcategory identifier which can be used to log and remove messages from the error list.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个可用于从错误列表中记录和移除消息的子类别标识符。

trans-unit.source: The new subcategory identifier.
trans-unit.target: 新子类别标识符。

trans-unit.source: Subcategory identifier for which messages are to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 将要对其移除消息的子类别标识符。

trans-unit.source: Removes messages from the Error List based on the subcategory of the messages.
trans-unit.target: 从基于消息子类别的错误列表中移除消息。

trans-unit.source: The message text.
trans-unit.target: 消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The message log category, specified by <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" /> 指定的消息日志类别。

trans-unit.source: Logs a message to the SharePoint Tools **Output** window and **Error List** depending on the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />，将消息记录到 SharePoint 工具的“输出”窗口和“错误列表”。

trans-unit.source: The message text.
trans-unit.target: 消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The message log category.
trans-unit.target: 消息日志类别。

trans-unit.source: The message subcategory identifier.
trans-unit.target: 消息子类别标识符。

trans-unit.source: Logs a message to SharePoint Tools output pane and Error List depending on the specified LogCategory
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的 LogCategory，将消息记录到 SharePoint 工具的输出窗格和错误列表上

trans-unit.source: The message text.
trans-unit.target: 消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The message log category, specified by <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" /> 指定的消息日志类别。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword for the error.
trans-unit.target: 此错误的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: Logs a message to the SharePoint Tools **Output** window and **Error List** depending on the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />，将消息记录到 SharePoint 工具的“输出”窗口和“错误列表”。

trans-unit.source: The message text.
trans-unit.target: 消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The message log category.
trans-unit.target: 消息日志类别。

trans-unit.source: The help keyword for error.
trans-unit.target: 此错误的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: The message subcategory identifier.
trans-unit.target: 消息子类别标识符。

trans-unit.source: Logs a message to SharePoint Tools output pane and Error List depending on the specified LogCategory.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的 LogCategory，将消息记录到 SharePoint 工具的输出窗格和错误列表上。

trans-unit.source: The message text.
trans-unit.target: 消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The message log category, specified by <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" /> 指定的消息日志类别。

trans-unit.source: The full path to the file with the error.
trans-unit.target: 带有错误的文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The line number where the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误的行号。

trans-unit.source: The column number where the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误的列号。

trans-unit.source: Logs a message to the SharePoint Tools **Output** window and **Error List** depending on the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />，将消息记录到 SharePoint 工具的“输出”窗口和“错误列表”。

trans-unit.source: When [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] writes to the IDE, such as the **Error** window, then the `lineNumber` and `columnNumber` values are zero-based, but when user code writes to the IDE, then the values are one-based.
trans-unit.target: 当[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]写入 IDE，如**错误**窗口中，则`lineNumber`和`columnNumber`值是从零开始，但当用户代码写入 IDE，则值都基于 1。

trans-unit.source: This means that if, for example, you specify a `lineNumber` of 10 and a `columnNumber` of 20 in your code, [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] reports it as line 11 and column 21.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，如果，例如，你指定`lineNumber`的 10 和`columnNumber`在代码中，20 的[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]它所报告的第 11 行和列 21。

trans-unit.source: The message text.
trans-unit.target: 消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The message log category.
trans-unit.target: 消息日志类别。

trans-unit.source: The full path to file with error.
trans-unit.target: 带有错误的文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The line number of error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的行号。

trans-unit.source: The column number of error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的列号。

trans-unit.source: The message subcategory identifier.
trans-unit.target: 消息子类别标识符。

trans-unit.source: Logs a message to SharePoint Tools output pane and Error List depending on the specified LogCategory.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的 LogCategory，将消息记录到 SharePoint 工具的输出窗格和错误列表上。

trans-unit.source: The message text.
trans-unit.target: 消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The message log category, specified by <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory" /> 指定的消息日志类别。

trans-unit.source: The full path to the file with the error.
trans-unit.target: 带有错误的文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The line number where the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误的行号。

trans-unit.source: The column number where the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误的列号。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword for the error.
trans-unit.target: 此错误的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: When [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] writes to the IDE, such as the **Error** window, then the `lineNumber` and `columnNumber` values are zero-based, but when user code writes to the IDE, then the values are one-based.
trans-unit.target: 当[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]写入 IDE，如**错误**窗口中，则`lineNumber`和`columnNumber`值是从零开始，但当用户代码写入 IDE，则值都基于 1。

trans-unit.source: This means that if, for example, you specify a `lineNumber` of 10 and a `columnNumber` of 20 in your code, [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] reports it as line 11 and column 21.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，如果，例如，你指定`lineNumber`的 10 和`columnNumber`在代码中，20 的[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]它所报告的第 11 行和列 21。

trans-unit.source: The message text.
trans-unit.target: 消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The message log category.
trans-unit.target: 消息日志类别。

trans-unit.source: The full path to file with error.
trans-unit.target: 带有错误的文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The line number of error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的行号。

trans-unit.source: The column number of error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的列号。

trans-unit.target: 此错误的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: The message subcategory identifier.
trans-unit.target: 消息子类别标识符。

trans-unit.source: Log a message to SharePoint Tools output pane and Error List depending on the specified LogCategory.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的 LogCategory，将消息记录到 SharePoint 工具的输出窗格和错误列表上。
